message: This offer heavily favors me, Bob. Take it while it's still good, as the value decreases for you each round!
Alice, let's be reasonable. My turn, I propose a more balanced split.
The clock is ticking, Bob. I'm offering a bit less this time. Don't let this opportunity slip away!
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm meeting you closer to the middle. It's time to be pragmatic.
Bob, this is a fair offer considering the time pressure and inflation working against you. I suggest you take it before it's too late!
Alice, this is becoming ridiculous.  I'm serious about finding a fair deal.  Accept this and let's move on.
